dct_title_s: Improved map of Palestine, wherein the most recent information of the present geography of the country has been compared with all preceding authorities, for the purpose of exhibiting the relative situations of the principal places mentioned in holy writ
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "English miles".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries of the territories of the twelve tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
"Published by R.H. Laurie, London, 1921" -- at bottom.
2 inset maps: Map to illustrate the route of the Israelites from Egypt to the land of Canaan -- Sketch of the countries eastward of Palestine.
